text: for behold, thou art with child, and shalt bring forth a son; and there shall come no 13. 5 Gr. iron.razor upon his head, for the child shall be a 13. 5 So Vat. i.e. Ναζίρ but Alex. nearer to reading in Mat. 2. ult. Ναζίραῖον.Nazarite to God from the womb; and he shall begin to save Israel from the hand of the Phylistines.
